originalText.text: A driver under the name “Alexis Arias El tipo” got mad at me because i couldn’t find his car so i ended up taking another cab, so he proceeds to text me very disrespectfully & yelled at me when he called me. This is ridiculous, this isn’t the first time i have an issue with this cab base.

originalText.text:
The worse morning experienced ever. I called over 12 times for a cab at around 12pm and it’s ridiculous that I couldn’t even get in contact with someone. To make matters worse , the guys at the windows were just letting the phone go off and not even worried about attending to. And I was the one calling from across the street
Worse cab service ever! WILL NEVER RECOMMEND

originalText.text: I wish I can give you zero star. It order for my to comment I had to tap one star. The drivers in these company are the worst. I called a cab for my son who has been in the ER At Columbia Presbyterian for over 8 hours. When the cab gets there and my son is walking to the car the driver Alejandro just took off on him and drove away. All my son wanted was to get home. We are a family that’s educated with morals, principles and descendants. My son is no delinquent. I will never use Riverside again.

originalText.text: I wish I could give you a CERO. I reserved a minivan to go to JFK Airport. They sent me a small car. It was too small for me, my family and our bags. The driver damaged one of my suitcases, I gave him $95.00 plus $10.00 tip forgetting the small cars are less pricey. So he never return to me the extra money I payed and. He is not paying my suitcase. I will never use Riverside Car Service again. The managers did not make the driver return the extra money, did not make him pay the suitcase. They demand respect from customers but. They do not show that respect back to the customers. They are not loyal to customers.
